summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Prologue
            - Section Title: Boss Fight - Erlang, the Sacred Divinity

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Prologue

Upon beginning your journey, you’ll be thrust into the role of the mythical Sun Wukong as he rebels against the Court of Heaven and its Heavenly Kings. Undaunted by their army, Sun Wukong calls them out, prompting the nephew of the Jade Emperor, Erlang Shen, to meet him in combat.

## Boss Fight - Erlang, the Sacred Divinity

Once you’ve removed a fourth of his health bar, Erlang will vanish before trying to ambush from above. When the fight resumes, he’ll get a little faster, and start blocking attacks, which is when you should try throwing more heavy attacks into the mix."
            - Following Text: "When Erlang falls to less than half health, another small scene will play out before the final bout, and Erlang will start invoking more of his divinity to blast you with projectiles. Since you can’t really take lasting damage, you can simply try dodging around, or hold the L2 button to deflect them."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
